CustomField.description: Based on RAI Days and RAI Start Date the value is calculated. If both values are null defaulted to 1
CustomField.formula: IF( (NOT(ISNULL(RAI_DAYS__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(RAI_Start_Date__c))), IF( (VALUE(RAI_DAYS__c) - (TODAY()- RAI_Start_Date__c) > 1), VALUE(RAI_DAYS__c) - (TODAY()- RAI_Start_Date__c), 1), 1 )
CustomField.label: Portal Remaining Days
